title: Maldives Adults-Only Private Pool Villa Paradise
description: Experience one of the Maldives’ most luxurious high-end resorts at the newly renovated Huvafen Fushi. Stay in a huge 125sqm Beach Bungalow with your own private pool and enjoy VIP butler service, return speedboat transfers from the capital of Malé (located just 30-minutes from resort), daily à la carte breakfasts served overlooking the turquoise lagoon, daily a la carte lunches and nightly three-course dinners featuring freshly caught seafood.

title: Maldives Adults-Only Private Pool Villa Paradise
description: Experience one of the Maldives’ most luxurious high-end resorts with five nights at the newly renovated Huvafen Fushi. Stay in a huge 125sqm Beach Bungalow with your own private pool and enjoy VIP butler service, return speedboat transfers from the capital of Malé - located just 30-minutes from resort - daily à la carte breakfasts served overlooking the turquoise lagoon and nightly three-course dinners featuring freshly caught seafood.

title: All-Inclusive Overwater Villa Paradise
description: Experience a luxury hideaway offering space, intimacy and authenticity  in the untouched Maldives surrounded by a striking coral reef at the five-star, all-villa Shangri-La’s Villingili Resort & Spa nestled on two kilometres of white sandy beach. Stay in a huge 166sqm overwater villa linked by floating timber pathways and indulge in breakfast, lunch, dinner, select alcoholic and soft drinks, return complimentary speedboat transfers, and an island host on request - all included in your package.
location_description: Shangri-La's Villingili Resort & Spa, Maldives - Nov 2018

title: Maldives Five-Star Radisson Blu Overwater Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Roundtrip Malé Transfers
description:
Breeze into a dreamy island paradise with a stay at the Radisson Blu Resort Maldives, located in the South Ari Atoll and accessible via a scenic 30-minute seaplane journey from Malé. Picture pearlescent waters and champagne sand stretches that exist in perfect harmony with a boutique collection of minimalistic private pool villas, which are expertly designed to bring the best of the outdoors within. Unwind in total seclusion in your grandiose villa with a private plunge pool, overwater hammock and endless ocean vistas.

Blissful days turn into unforgettable nights at this outdoor playground where you'll be spoiled with ways to fill your day. Bathe in the golden rays by the resort's gleaming pool, dip your toes in the crystal-clear ocean waters or get your thrill with an adrenaline-pumping jet-ski adventure. Life below the waves is just as exciting - drop into the onsite PADI dive centre to explore an underwater world teeming with life. Savour refined fare across the resort’s three restaurants and three bars, be dazzled by a selection of world-class treatments at the Blu Spa, clear your mind at the calming yoga pavilion or just kick back and relax while making lifelong memories with friends and family.
offer_address: Huruelhi Island, South Ari Atoll, 20026, Maldives

title: Shangri-La Overwater Villa Luxury with Premium Nightly Dinners
description: Experience the pinnacle of luxury in a tropical hideaway combining space, intimacy and authenticity. Discover a sanctuary of bliss in the untouched Maldives surrounded by a striking coral reef at the five-star, all-villa Shangri-La’s Villingili Resort & Spa; nestled on a two-kilometre stretch of white sandy beach. Turn up the luxury staying in a huge 166sqm Overwater Villa linked only by floating timber pathways and indulge in daily buffet breakfast, premium nightly buffet dinner, nightly selection of house cocktails and beverages for one hour during dinner, return speedboat transfers from Gan International Airport, a round of golf at the Maldives' largest golf course, complimentary non-motorised water sports and an island host on request - all included in your package. Plus, two kids (aged five years and under) stay and eat free from a kids menu.

title: Finolhu: All-Inclusive Maldives Paradise
description: Surrender to island life with an all-inclusive dream stay in an overwater Lagoon Villa at the beautiful Finolhu resort. Enjoy a five-night stay with all meals, unlimited alcoholic and soft drinks, a cocktail-making class and savings on domestic transfers for two adults.

title: Grand Opening: World-Class Indulgence at the Fairmont Maldives
description: Be one of the first to experience this rustic chic, all-villa resort located on the Maldives’ largest lagoon. The grand opening of the much-anticipated Fairmont Maldives Sirru Fen Fushi has taken world-class luxury to a whole new level with seven nights in a gorgeous villa with daily buffet breakfast, amazing dining every night including nightly buffet dinners like no other at the Raha Market and return island domestic plane plus speedboat transfers. What are you waiting for?
location_description: Fairmont Maldives, Sirru Fen Fushi - June 2018
offer_address: Unit 2B Faamdheyrige, Orchid Magu, Male  Maldives, Maldives  Shaviyani Atoll, 20209

vendor_name: Centara Ras Fushi Resort & Spa Maldives
title: Unlimited All-Inclusive Maldives Escape
description: Experience our most affordable Maldives deal ever with the ultimate all-inclusive package including six meals a day, unlimited alcohol and ISLAND TRANSFERS from Malé. Immerse yourself in tropical island life with a dreamy child-free five-night escape staying in an Ocean Front Beach Villa at Centara Ras Fushi Resort & Spa Maldives. Includes buffet and à la carte meals, selected unlimited alcohol from 11am to 11pm including an international selection of wine, beer, spirits and cocktails, non-motorised water sports including snorkelling, kayaking and paddle boarding, and more for only $1,499 per person (twin share), valued up to $6,900. WATCH THE RESORT VIDEO BELOW. UPGRADE: Overwater villa upgrades with direct lagoon access are available from just $500 extra per person.

vendor_name: Centara Grand Island Resort & Spa Maldives
title: Ultimate All-Inclusive Maldives
description: Paradise on earth exists at Centara Grand Island Resort & Spa Maldives with unbelievable inclusions such as return domestic flight and boat transfers, a welcome glass of bubbles each, daily champagne breakfasts, daily lunches, nightly dinners served in any of the resort's three restaurants and unlimited daily beers, wines, spirits and cocktails from 10am. There’s also a daily US$100 spa credit per person, a range of excursions including a snorkelling tour, whale shark boat trip, sunset cruise, local island exploration and sunset fishing and a daily replenished minibar.
location_description: Centara Grand Island Resort & Spa Maldives OLD*

title: Maldives Designer Private Residences with Dedicated Butler Service, Beach Access & Daily Breakfast
description: Find sanctuary in private, pristine paradise on Maldives' secluded Dhonakulhi Island in The Signature Collection at Hideaway, an elevated curation of beachfront villas on the resort's northernmost point. This is five-star fancy at its finest, with dedicated butler service, private pools and access to four exquisite restaurants serving fresh seafood and Asian fusion alongside one of the largest whisky and fine champagne collections in the Maldives. Each villa is fitted with state-of-the-art accoutrements and Middle-Eastern-inspired furnishings in shades of Pacific blue and gold. Luxuriate on your private sundeck, or if you can pull yourself away from your own villa's paradise, retreat to Hideaway Spa, where therapists will pamper you with Ayurvedic treatments and cutting-edge Natura Bissé products.
offer_address: Haa Alifu Atoll, Dhonakulhi Island, Maldives
